p: Small hive beetles ( Aethina tumida) were reared in acrylic cages (38 × 38 × 34 cm) in the insectaria at the Insect Ecology Laboratory, Andong National University (ANU). The colony was maintained at 25 ± 2 °C, 60% ± 10% RH, and 12 L:12 D photoperiod on pollen dough. On preliminary testing, no significant differences between male and female responses of SHB were found with test samples ( p> 0.05). Thus, adult beetles (either sex) were used for bioassays.
